QueryViewSpec.Name: Constituent Non Unique Constituencies Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Used to find constituents that have duplicate constituencies that fail the isunique constraint
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select constit.ID, constit.LOOKUPID, constit.NAME, cc.DESCRIPTION, c.DATEFROM, c.DATETO from dbo.CONSTITUENCY c join dbo.CONSTITUENT constit on c.CONSTITUENTID = constit.ID join dbo.CONSTITUENCYCODE cc on cc.ID = c.CONSTITUENCYCODEID where dbo.UFN_CONSTITUENCY_ISUNIQUE (CONSTITUENTID, CONSTITUENCYCODEID, DATEFROM, DATETO) = 0
